      • Function GetHiddenColumnList(mainRange As Range) As Long()

        Function GetHiddenColumnList(mainRange As Range) As Long()
        Details:

        ''Public Function GetFilterCriteria(FilterRng As Range, sheetnm As String) As Variant
        ''
        ''
        '''-----------Declaration-------------
        '' Dim i As Long
        '' Dim strCriteria As Variant
        '' Dim cnt As Long
        '' Dim arr() As Variant
        '' Dim ct, j As Long
        '' Dim X
        '' Dim ht As New HashTable
        '' Dim str As String
        '' Dim Activesheets As String
        '' Dim ArrFilterCriteria
        '' '---------------------------------
        '' Application.ScreenUpdating = False 'Added By : Cuboidology 4(24-Jan-2014)
        '' Activesheets = ActiveSheet.Name
        '' Sheets(sheetnm).activate
        '' If Sheets(sheetnm).AutoFilterMode = False Then
        '' FilterRng.AutoFilter
        '' End If
        '' If Not ActiveSheet.AutoFilter Is Nothing Then
        '' cnt = FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters.count
        '' ReDim strCriteria(1 To cnt, 1 To 3, 1 To 1)
        '' If FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.filterMode = True Then
        '' For i = 1 To FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters.count
        '' If FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).On Then
        '' RowfilterFlag = True 'Added By : Cuboidology 4(24-Jan-2014)
        '' If VBA.IsDate(FilterRng.Cells(2, i)) Then
        '' ct = 0
        '' strCriteria(i, 2, 1) = i
        '' strCriteria(i, 3, 1) = 2
        '' For Each X In Application.interSect(FilterRng, FilterRng.Columns(i).offset(1, 0)).SpecialCells(xlCellTypeVisible)
        '' If X.Value <> "" Or IsEmpty(X) Then
        '' If ht.Exists(X.Value) = False Then
        '' ht.Add X.Value, 1
        '' ct = ct + 1
        '' ReDim Preserve arr(1 To ct * 2)
        '' arr(ct * 2 - 1) = CLng(2)
        '' If strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = "" Then
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = CStr(X.Value)
        '' Else
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = strCriteria(i, 1, 1) & "[,]" & CStr(X.Value)
        '' End If
        '' End If
        '' Else
        '' If strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = "" Then
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = "="
        '' Else
        '' If InStr(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), "=") = 0 Then
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = strCriteria(i, 1, 1) & "[,]" & "="
        '' End If
        '' End If
        '' End If
        '' Next X
        '' Erase arr
        '' Set ht = Nothing
        '' ElseIf TypeName(FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria1) = "String" Then
        '' strCriteria(i, 2, 1) = i
        '' strCriteria(i, 3, 1) = 1
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria1
        '' On Error Resume Next
        '' If Not IsEmpty(FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria2) Then
        '' strCriteria(i, 3, 1) = 0
        '' If strCriteria(i, 1, 1) <> "<>" And strCriteria(i, 1, 1) <> "=" Then
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = Right(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), Len(CStr(strCriteria(i, 1, 1))) - 1)
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = strCriteria(i, 1, 1) & "[,]" & Right(FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria2, Len(CStr(FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria2)) - 1)
        '' Else
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = strCriteria(i, 1, 1) & "[,]" & Right(FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria2, Len(CStr(FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria2)) - 1)
        '' End If
        '' End If
        '' ElseIf TypeName(FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria1) = "Variant()" Then
        '' ArrFilterCriteria = FilterRng.Worksheet.AutoFilter.Filters(i).Criteria1
        '' For j = LBound(ArrFilterCriteria) To UBound(ArrFilterCriteria)
        '' ArrFilterCriteria(j) = ArrFilterCriteria(j)
        '' strCriteria(i, 2, 1) = i
        '' strCriteria(i, 3, 1) = 0
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = strCriteria(i, 1, 1) & Right(ArrFilterCriteria(j), Len(CStr(ArrFilterCriteria(j))) - 1) & "[,]"
        '' Next j
        '' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = Mid(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), 1, Len(strCriteria(i, 1, 1)) - 3)
        '' End If
        '' End If
        '' FilterRng.AutoFilter Field:=i
        '' Next
        '' End If
        '' End If
        '' GetFilterCriteria = strCriteria
        ''
        ''endsub:
        '' '-----------Declaration Clear-------------
        '' i = vbNull
        '' str = vbNullString
        '' cnt = vbNull
        '' Erase arr
        '' X = vbNull
        '' '------------------------------------------
        ''End Function
        ''
        'Public Function SetFilterCriteria(FilterRng As Range, strCriteria As Variant) As Boolean
        '
        ' On Error GoTo ErrDescription:
        '
        ''-----------Declaration-------------------
        ' Dim i As Long
        ' Dim UBstrCriteria As Long
        ' Dim arr
        ' Dim arr1
        ' Dim blankCharPos As Long, notBlankCahrPos As Long
        ' Dim flagBlank As Boolean: flagBlank = False
        ' Dim filterStr As String
        ' '------------------------------------------
        ' If Sheets(ActiveSheet.Name).AutoFilterMode = False Then
        ' FilterRng.AutoFilter
        ' End If
        ' UBstrCriteria = UBound(strCriteria)
        ' Dim str As Variant
        ' If UBstrCriteria > 0 Then
        ' For i = 1 To UBstrCriteria
        ' If strCriteria(i, 2, 1) <> 0 Then
        ' If strCriteria(i, 3, 1) = 2 Then
        ' blankCharPos = InStr(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), "=")
        ' notBlankCahrPos = InStr(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), "<>")
        ' If blankCharPos <> 0 Or notBlankCahrPos <> 0 Then
        ' If Len(strCriteria(i, 1, 1)) = 1 Or Len(strCriteria(i, 1, 1)) = 2 Then
        ' filterStr = strCriteria(i, 1, 1)
        ' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = ""
        ' ElseIf Len(strCriteria(i, 1, 1)) = blankCharPos Or Len(strCriteria(i, 1, 1)) = (notBlankCahrPos - 1) Then
        ' If blankCharPos <> 0 Then
        ' filterStr = "="
        ' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = left(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), blankCharPos - 4)
        ' End If
        ' If notBlankCahrPos <> 0 Then
        ' filterStr = "<>"
        ' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = left(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), notBlankCahrPos - 4)
        ' End If
        ' ElseIf blankCharPos = 1 Or notBlankCahrPos = 1 Then
        ' If blankCharPos = 1 Then
        ' filterStr = "="
        ' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = Mid(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), 5, Len(strCriteria(i, 1, 1)))
        ' End If
        ' If notBlankCahrPos = 1 Then
        ' filterStr = "<>"
        ' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = Mid(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), 6, Len(strCriteria(i, 1, 1)))
        ' End If
        ' Else
        ' If blankCharPos <> 0 Then
        ' filterStr = "="
        ' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = Mid(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), 1, blankCharPos - 1) & Mid(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), blankCharPos + 4)
        ' End If
        ' If notBlankCahrPos = 1 Then
        ' filterStr = "<>"
        ' strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = Mid(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), 1, blankCharPos - 1) & Mid(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), blankCharPos + 5)
        ' End If
        ' End If
        ' End If
        ' If filterStr <> "" And strCriteria(i, 1, 1) <> "" Then
        ' str = Replace(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), "[,]", "[|]4[|]")
        ' str = "4[|]" & str
        ' arr = Split(str, "[|]")
        ' arr1 = Split(filterStr, "[|]")
        ' On Error Resume Next
        ' FilterRng.AutoFilter Field:=strCriteria(i, 2, 1), Criteria1:=Array(arr1), Operator:=xlFilterValues, Criteria2:=Array(arr)
        ' Else
        ' If filterStr <> "" Then
        ' FilterRng.AutoFilter Field:=strCriteria(i, 2, 1), Criteria1:=filterStr, Operator:=xlFilterValues
        ' End If
        ' If strCriteria(i, 1, 1) <> "" Then
        ' str = Replace(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), "[,]", "[|]4[|]")
        ' str = "4[|]" & str
        ' arr = Split(str, "[|]")
        ' On Error Resume Next
        ' FilterRng.AutoFilter Field:=strCriteria(i, 2, 1), Criteria2:=Array(arr), Operator:=xlFilterValues
        ' End If
        '
        ' End If
        ' ElseIf strCriteria(i, 3, 1) = 0 Then
        ' arr = Split(strCriteria(i, 1, 1), "[,]")
        ' If strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = "<>" Or strCriteria(i, 1, 1) = "=" Then
        ' FilterRng.AutoFilter Field:=strCriteria(i, 2, 1), Criteria1:=strCriteria(i, 1, 1), Operator:=xlFilterValues
        ' Else
        ' FilterRng.AutoFilter Field:=strCriteria(i, 2, 1), Criteria1:=Array(arr), Operator:=xlFilterValues
        ' End If
        ' Else
        ' FilterRng.AutoFilter Field:=strCriteria(i, 2, 1), Criteria1:=strCriteria(i, 1, 1), Operator:=xlFilterValues
        ' End If
        ' End If
        ' Next
        ' End If
        ' SetFilterCriteria = True
        ' GoTo endsub
        'ErrDescription:
        ' SetFilterCriteria = False
        'endsub:
        ' '-----------Declaration Clear-------------
        ' i = vbNull
        ' Set FilterRng = Nothing
        ' UBstrCriteria = vbNull
        ' '------------------------------------------
        '
        'End Function
        '
        'Added by cuboidology-5 on 22-Oct-2013
